meta.name: description
meta.content: Welcome to one of the finest school districts in the State of Texas. Thank you for taking the time to find out more about our schools and the many excellent programs we have available for our students. Rotan Independent School District is a wonderful place to educate a child. This environment is made possible by the tremendous parent and community support for our schools, as well as by a hardworking and dedicated staff.

a.aria-label: view School has been CLOSED event

div.p: Governor has closed school until the end of the year. Graduation for 2020 will be determined April 24. Home schooling continues.

div.h4: New Food Services during School Closing
div.p: Please fill out this form to help with the food count to be distributed to students during the school closing 03/23/20 â€“Â 05/04/20. Food will be delivered. Lunch and next days Breakfast 11:00 - 12:00. Menus will be updated weekly. If you need to schedule another time for delivery, Please call Rotan ISD with questions.

Rotan ISD
4/2/2020
Due to the Governor of Texasâ€™ announcement to keep all school districts closed until May 4th, Rotan ISD will be closed indefinitely. Rotan ISD will continue to give academic instruction through online and packet pickup.
All RISD students are required to complete work assigned by each of their teachers. At the end of the semester, each studentâ€™s work will be reviewed by a committee to determine pass/fail. This determination is based on the amount of effort each student puts forth in the work assigned by each teacher. If a student does not complete work assigned, they will be retained.
Secondary students' work is assigned online and should be turned in online based on class due dates. Elementary students are asked to pick up packet work each Monday in the Administration office and return their work through the SeeSaw app as it is completed. Each teacher has sent home the â€œhome learning codeâ€ for SeeSaw and we are requiring all parents/students to use this app to communicate with teachers and turn in work. The home learning app IS different than the family app. If you need assistance with the SeeSaw app, please call or come by the Administration office and we will be happy to help. If an elementary or secondary student does not have internet access, please call and other arrangements can be made.
RISD will continue to deliver meals to students throughout the time off. We will be closed and not delivering meals April 10th and April 13th for the Easter holiday.
The administration office will be open Monday - Thursday, 8:00 - 12:00. All phone calls and communication about students and instruction need to be directed to 325-735-2332 ext. 04. The Elementary and Secondary offices will be closed beginning Monday, April 6th.
Thanks, Greg Decker Rotan ISD Superintendent

Parents and students we are aware that some students may be having technical issues on their devices that are not allowing them to submit assignments. Therefore any assignments due before next Friday will not be considered late. Our technology department will be working with each student to correct these problems. Please bare with us as we work through these issues this next week. We would like to thank everyone for working with us in these uncharted times in education. Please contact Randy Hodges rhodges@rotan.esc14.net with any technical issues.
